data.value: Did you seek any debt advice before making this payment?

data.value: Is the creditor a friend or relative?

data.value: Cancel

data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this preferred creditor?

data.name: PreferredCreditors_PreferredAnyCreditors_Label
data.value: In the last 2 years, have you ever preferred any creditors over others in your payments?

data.name: PreferredCreditors_PressureFromCreditorToMakePayment_Label
data.value: Did the creditor put you under pressure to make this payment?

data.name: PreferredCreditors_WhyDidntYouSplitTheFunds_Label
data.value: Why did you make a preferential payment to this creditor instead of splitting the money between your creditors?

data.name: PreferredCreditors_WhyDidYouMakeThePayment_Label
data.value: Why did you make this payment?

data.name: PreferredCreditors_HowMuchRemaining_HelpText
data.value: Enter £0 if you didn't have any money left after making the payment

data.name: PreferredCreditors_HowMuchRemaining_Label
data.value: How much money did you have left after the payment?

data.name: PreferredCreditors_SeekHelpBeforePayemnt_Label
data.value: Did you seek advice about your debts before making this payment?

data.name: PreferredCreditors_DateOfPayment_Error_Incomplete
data.value: Please provide your answer in the dd/mm/yyyy format

data.name: PreferredCreditors_DateOfPayment_HelpText1
data.value: If you made multiple preferential payments to this creditor, enter the date of the most recent one

data.name: PreferredCreditors_WhoDidYouSellItem_Label
data.value: Who is the preferred creditor?

data.name: PreferredCreditors_DateOfPayment_Label_HelpText2
data.value: For example, 31 08 1976.

data.name: PreferredCreditors_HowMuchPaid_Label_HelpText
data.value: If you made multiple preferential payments to this creditor, enter the total sum of these payments

data.name: PreferredCreditors_PreferredAnyCreditors_Label_HelpText
data.value: Don’t include payments made using other people’s money, for example where a friend or relative has made payments on your behalf

data.name: PreferredCreditors_WhyDidYouMakeThePayment_Label_HelpText
data.value: Include why you were motivated to make the payment at this time, details of any excessive pressure the creditor placed you under, whether any other creditors were chasing you for repayments at this time and whether you continued to meet the minimum contractual repayments to your other creditors immediately after making this payment

data.name: PreferredCreditors_Summary_Table_Title
data.value: Preferred creditors summary

data.value: Please provide the preferred creditor's name.

data.name: PreferredCreditors_NameOfPreferredCreditor_Error_TooLong
data.value: The preferred creditor's name should be between 1 and 50 characters
